data.suite-page-organization-plan-create-erro: Please indicate at least one plan period.

data.suite-page-organization-plan-create-plan: Subscribers will get all credits at once.
1 month and shorter subscribers will get all credits at once. Over 3 months subscribers will get credits every month.
data.suite-page-organization-plan-create-pric: Members will be able to use cards for any sum between US$0.50 and US$5,000, or your local currency equivalent.
